---
id: add-labels-to-workflows
title: "Add labels to workflows"

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/workflow/labels/add"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



Adds the given list of labels to the given workflows. Existing labels are preserved.
